title: Varieties of Exile
lyrics:
Every word sounds like a siren
Into the town, breaking the silence
It's a good life, wait and it's over
Everywhere, ever, oh
We never would had mind

Here for next time



If there was doubt

It's getting colder

In a new light

I'd turn it over

I can't decide

If there's another

Hand on your fate, never



We never would had mind

Here for next time

We never would had mind

Here for next time
